title: New ResultSet Message
description: Pulse message sent whenever a new result-set is created.

project.title: Project Name
project.description: Identifier for treeherder project, like `try` or `mozilla-central`.

revision_hash.title: Revision Hash Identifier
revision_hash.description: Identifier for the result-set that was created.

revision.title: Top Revision Identifier
revision.description: Identifier for the result-set that was created.

repository_url.title: Repository URL
repository_url.description: URL for the repository for the revision.
